title: En Usuru Ennai Vittu Lyrics Sengathu Boomiyile Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Reeta
Song: En Usuru Ennai Vittu
Movie: Sengathu Boomiyile
Music : Ilaiyaraaja
Lyrics :Ilaiyaraaja
En Usuru Ennai Vittu ponnalum
Unna vittu pogathu
Theeyilathaan yen udambu vendhalum
Un ninaipu vegaaathu
Ennodu nenjukulla enna irndhadhunu
Ippo purinjale podhum

En Usuru Ennai Vittu ponnalum
Unna vittu pogathu
Theeyilathaan yen udambu vendhalum
Un ninaipu vegaaathu

Poomudikka kathirundhen,Palimudika ponnaye
Vazhvu thara kettirundhen
Sagadichu parthaaye
Nammoda oorgolam paakama nan ponen
Ennodu oorgolam ne paapiya
oor mala ennaenna paaru..
Un mala enmela podu..

En Usuru Ennai Vittu ponnalum
Unna vittu pogathu
Theeyilathaan yen udambu vendhalum
Un ninaipu vegaaathu
Ennodu nenjukulla enna irndhadhunu
Ippo purinjale podhum
category: Song:En Usuru Ennai Vittu - Sengathu Boomiyile
